name: Hyde and Seek 'Out of Control' GMTK2020
name_original: Hyde and Seek 'Out of Control' GMTK2020
description:
Night time is fast approaching, and you need to take your antidote before something bad happens.

Collect the items and take them to your desk, but beware.. someone else has a different plan for how the night will begin. 

Beat the clock, beat the beast, and survive another night.

UNLOCKED
Code: Yvo von Berg Art & Design: Karolina Tomaszewska and Cameron Mitchell

Note: Part of GMTK2020 Out of Control gamejam, made in 48H
